DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; NATIONWIDE ; KLAN PLANS RALLIES PROTESTING KING DAY
DOC.TEXT: The NAACP and others are planning to counter the Ku Klux Klan ' s protests this weekend against the Martin_Luther_King Jr . holiday on Monday , including demonstrations in some klan leaders ' neighborhoods . Rallies at state capitols in Ohio , Colorado , Arkansas , Kansas , Alabama , Florida , Texas and Illinois are being organized by the Knights of the Ku Klux Klan ' s national office in Harrison , Ark . However , some NAACP chapter presidents said counterdemonstrations would only give the klan more attention because of increased media coverage .
